data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Pool, Republic of Congo who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pool, Republic of Congo
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, provide a good translation of the Bible for the 35,133 believers in Pool, Republic of Congo.
Father, bring yourself glory in Pool. Through your servants plant 48 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Pool, Republic of Congo, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Pool, Republic of Congo to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Pool, Republic of Congo a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Pool, Republic of Congo.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

location.name: Pool
location.people_groups_list: Mbosi, Arab, Pygmy, Bayaka, Hausa, Teke, Northern
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mbosi (557,000), Arab (1,200), Pygmy, Bayaka (41,000), Hausa (11,000), Teke, Northern (87,000)
